attributes.action: Deport immigrants who commit crimes including theft, rape, robbery, violent crimes, etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any immigrant found guilty of committing a violent crime, theft, robbery, mugging, rape, murder, death by dangerous driving, drug possession / drug dealing, human trafficing, etc etc should be deported with immediate effect to their country of origin and NEVER be allowed back into the UK.
We the British tax payer, do not see why we would wish to invite "bad" people like this to stay in our country or support them whilst serving a prison sentence for crimes listed above.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
